organization.label: My Organization
organization.description: All members with an account to {orgName} can participate
organization.disabledTooltip: Only organization administrators can create organization channels.

public.label: Public
public.description: Anyone with an account can participate
public.disabledTooltip: Only organization administrators can create public channels.

confirmation.message: Saving these changes will remove your edit access to this channel. Only organization adminstrators can edit public or organization channels.

participants.label: Participants
participants.helperText: The people who can view and contribute to the discussion.

blockWords.label: Blocked words
blockWords.helperText: Comma separated list. Posts and replies that contain them will be hidden automatically.

manage.label: Manage and moderate
manage.helperText: Auto-assigned based on the participation selections above these people can participate, hide or show posts, and manage channel settings.

validations.minChannelGroups: Private channels require at least one participant group.

notices.edit: Edits will affect everywhere this channel is used

error.title: Channel was not created
error.message: A channel with these access selections already exists. Use the existing channel or modify the selections.

error.title: Channel was not updated
error.message: A channel with these access selections already exists so we can not save these updates.

inaccessibleGroups.title: Unavailable groups: {count}
inaccessibleGroups.message: You cannot view or manage unavailable groups unless you are a member.
